nodes.text: Skyscan 6 was a space station located above the planet 244Core.

Located in geosynchronous orbit directly above the city of Eeookko, Skyscan 6 was a small space station was one of several stations that operated as part of the Skyscan early warning system, set up to detect meteorites and asteroids that threaten the planet's surface. Skyscan 6 was directly operated by Eeook Corporation, and was manned by thirty individuals who kept a constant vigil both the sky as well as Eeookko's neighbors. The station was lightly armed for defense against pirates, but also carried heavy missiles for destroying or altering the course of incoming asteroids.
